sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import globalContext from '../context/globalContext' const axios = require('axios') const Transactions = () => { const [transaction, setTransaction] =useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios .get('https://localhost:5000/transaction') .then(res=> setTransaction(res.data)) .catch(err=> console.log(err)) console.log(transaction) }, []) return (
{transaction?.map((trans) => )}
FROM TO AMOUNT DATE
{trans.name} {trans.name} {trans.amount} {trans.date}
)} export default Transactions
